title: I'm really interested in learning psychology. I'm still a beginner. Are there any specific books I should start with? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are from India then you should refer to NCERT class 11 and 12 text books. It has covered wide range of topics in classical as well as modern psychology. After finishing them you can proceed to Dr Paul Blooms lectures from Yale university on YouTube. He is a very engaging teacher and you would enjoy the series of 20 lectures. If your interest still survives then purchase Introduction to Psychology by Baron, Mishra. It is a comprehensive guide to Indian perspective in psychology.
